results.name: Eigentriangle, row sums = A006318
comment: Row sums = A006318. Left border = A001003.
Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = A001003(n-k)*A006318(k-1) with A006318(-1)=1. (corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 19 2016)
